column4: totem says "Your GStreamer installation is missing a plug-in". I already installed w32codecs and libdvdcss2, whats wrong?
so how do i install a general dvd codec? and why did it work on the other machine? i am confused
then an error is a bad sign, isnt it?
which is why i am asking him what the error is
lotharn btw. CTRL-0 (zero) does nothing on my nano
fsck is filesystem check, not hard drive check
i thought, it had some "active" option, how would you do a surface check?
not funny. a hard drive comes without a setup cd usually *g* there is a native linux tool for that.
there probably is, and it is recommended to use the manufacturer's tools for the job
the manufacturer's provide their own tools for a reason
i would happily use manufacturers tools, but i am too lazy to hunt for the downloads
too lazy to google for "seagate tools download" (for example) instead of "bad block test linux" (example)?  Strnage
well... i dont like to use google at all very much. Do you know, if there are tools for linux? or are they DOS disks/windows progs?
all of the tools I use are boot from CD tools, since the manufacturer makes the asusmption that it's the only drive you have
